name: JumpIT (AtlasoftGames)
description:
Planet earth scientists have recently invented a technology to allow them to control the planet and make it move in space, this in view of an asteroid invasion.

They also discovered a material that allows you to energize this technology to make bigger jumps, which is in the form of lightning.

You have only normal jumps and double jumps available!
Your goal is to get the earth to safety from asteroids by reaching the last of them.

We trust in you commander, do not disappoint us!

"Hi, I'm Kady and i'll help you to play this game!"

NOW AVAILABLE IN
